about_the_game:
background Of the story:

Chaos in the universe, Pangu opening the sky, N ü wa repairing the sky, leaving behind colorful divine stones, nurturing the divine monkey Wukong
The heavenly court is vast, and Wukong accepts the invitation of the ancient Buddha to light a lamp and travel to other time and space to search for his destined son
In the year 4725 of Xuanyuan, which is 2028 AD. earth
With the advancement of technology and the decline of human civilization, the wealth gap is widening, with approximately 2% of humanity owning 98% of the wealth, causing social unrest and hardship for the people.
Societies in various regions are on the brink of disintegration, and the collapse of rituals and music can only occur with just one thought
The young Lin Po Tian is full of ambition and only hopes to climb the Shu Road in the future. If there is no sound, it will be done. With one sound, it will move the nine heavens

Game Description
During the Tang Dynasty, Wukong was victimized by Rulai, Six-Eared Macaque and Wutian, and lost all his magical powers. He accidentally received the advice of the ancient Buddha, and traveled to other regions of time and space to find a way to save himself.
In the year of Xuan Yuan 4725, i.e. 2028 A.D., he meets a complacent teenager, Lin Botian, who has no light left in his life and attempts to commit suicide, but is saved by Wukong, a man who comes to shatter the void. Wukong helps the teenager to go back to high school, to experience life again, and to try to escape from this corrupt real world!
Returning to his student days, Lin Botian and Su Xue Ning lived a carefree life. However, unintentionally contacted the school under the ice floe hidden huge conspiracy, was forced to undercover investigation, three years later and three years, in the help of his friend Fu Yanqing, successfully broken the dark forces, but also a trace of innocence on earth, and then continue to travel to other space and time, to collect the power of the real!

dominating Figure:

wukong

Born to nurture, nurtured by N ü wa filling the sky stone, and connected to the fate of an orchid, it has the bloodline of Pangu. Controlled by extraterrestrial creatures, causing chaos in the Heavenly Palace and shattering into the sky, purified by Zixia
But is it really that simple? Under the planning of the Tathagata, the Six Eared Macaque, and the Heavenly Emperor, Wukong lost all his magical power. He accepted the advice of the ancient Buddha who lit the lamp and went to other time and space regions to search for a way to save him

lin Po Tian:

I was originally a young ambitious person in 2028, but due to the trend, I was unemployed, without support, and attempted to jump off a building. Saved by Wukong who stepped into the void and became the Son of Destiny. Can use some of Wukong's powers
With the help of Wukong, he traveled back to his high school days and made new friends such as Su Xuening
In a mysterious way, he discovered a huge conspiracy hidden in the school for various reasons, which led him to start investigating. Finally, with the help of his friend Fu Yanqing, he single handedly wiped out the criminal group
Later, he followed Wukong to other parallel time and space to collect power

su Xuening:

A student from Haichuan Middle School, Lin Botian's desk mate, and one of the official designated girlfriends
I was raised by my aunt since I was young, and my relationship with her was not harmonious due to some secrets
Beautiful figure, tall, talented, intelligent, like to play games, personality
Frequently bullying Lin Botian, he is the only person in the school who can control Botian (although most likely it is Botian who gives way to her)
Due to experiencing some indescribable dark experiences, she was cold and reclusive, but being teased, she untied her heart knot and gradually opened up to him, becoming a cute and energetic girl

zhao Xiyue:

Unknown origin, Lin Botian grew up together in an orphanage since childhood. She is his childhood sweetheart's younger sister, who is exceptionally intelligent, has outstanding looks, is lively and lovely, has strong hands-on ability, and is good at making delicious food.
To capture a man's heart, first capture his stomach
Treating Po Tian as the only family member, so harboring great hostility towards Su Xuening, the two of them would take action upon meeting, without hesitation
One of the women cherished by Po Tian in his heart

jinggai Biao:

A student from Haichuan Middle School, Brother Po Tian, with a simple and silly personality and a slightly mediocre temperament
Hobbies: Traditional Crafts and Games
It's not an exaggeration to say he's a gaming genius, but his native family is quite abstract
It is a product of the collision between the prejudice against internet addicted teenagers in the old era and the rapid development of the internet in the new era
Is it the birth of a legend or the downfall of nothingness? Please refer to the game for details

fu Yanqing:

A student from Haichuan Middle School, Brother Po Tian, the two are as close as siblings
After the reign of Emperor Fu Jian of Former Qin, the power of prestigious families and clans rose to great heights
